name: Privileged communication
text:
Communications between registered clinical social workers and their clients shall be treated in the same manner as provided for psychologist-client privilege under rule 504.1 of the Hawaii Rules of Evidence. [L 2001, c 229, §§1, 5; am L 2002, c 167, §17]
   [Section effective July 1, 2004.  For section effective until June 30, 2004, see above.]  Communications between licensed clinical social workers and their clients shall be treated in the same manner as provided for psychologist-client privilege under rule 504.1 of the Hawaii Rules of Evidence. [L 2001, c 229, §§1, 5; am L 2002, c 167, §§16, 17]
